objects.description: [APT29](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0016) used forged SAML tokens that allowed the actors to impersonate users and bypass MFA, enabling [APT29](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0016) to access enterprise cloud applications and services.(Citation: Microsoft 365 Defender Solorigate)

external_references.description: Microsoft 365 Defender Team. (2020, December 28). Using Microsoft 365 Defender to protect against Solorigate. Retrieved January 7, 2021.
